text: 12.104 Part 2(b) sets out that low cost rented family homes should generally be designed to include a mix of homes which offer open plan living spaces and also separate kitchen and living room which offers choice to meet the preferences of those living in the borough and in housing need. 12.105 Part 3 recognises the benefits of dual aspect dwellings to the Tower Hamlets Local Plan 101 HOMES FOR THE COMMUNITY
